page.shortlink: api object name expand ext function
page.description: Expand an object name (in an external data dictionary) from <object name> to <object name>@<data dictionary>
page.syntax: Object_Name_Expanded as C = OBJECT_NAME_EXPAND_EXT(C object_name, C object_class)

argument.name: object_class
argument.description: The type of object. See Object Types.

page.discussion: OBJECT_NAME_EXPAND_EXT() is the same as OBJECT_NAME_EXPAND(), except that it checks an external dictionary (i.e. one that is not attached to the current database). In this case, Object_Name must be fully qualified. E.g. "customer@c:\a5mydata\customer.ddd"
